original_text: Warn those people who are rich with many things that belong to this world. Tell them not to think that they are more important than other people. They must not think that their money will keep them safe. They could easily lose all of it. Instead, they should trust God. He gives us many things, so that we can enjoy all of them.
korean_text: 네가 이 세대에서 부한 자들을 명하여 마음을 높이지 말고 정함이 없는 재물에 소망을 두지 말고 오직 우리에게 모든 것을 후히 주사 누리게 하시는 하나님께 두며

sentences.original_text: Warn those people who are rich
with many things that belong to this world
Tell them not to think that they are more important
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 더 중요하다고 생각하지 말라고 말하라

sentences.original_text: They must not think that their money will keep them safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신의 돈이 자신을 안전하게 지켜줄 것이라고 생각해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: They could easily lose all of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 것을 쉽게 잃을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: so that we can enjoy all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그것들을 모두 즐길 수 있도록
